short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Sparks to your MindLi account from any browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***This extension is part of the MindLi platform

Welcome to MindLi™ - Empower AI Thinkers,

- The problem: Unorganized content like URLs, tasks, ideas, and notes spread across different platforms are difficult to find when needed.
- The solution: One tool to capture, store, process (with AI), and find all your thinking.

MindLi organizes your thinking through two main building blocks:
- Boxes: Set your personal or professional goals, enabling you to organize and categorize your Sparks. For example, create a 'Career' box to group all Sparks related to your career goals.
- Sparks: “nuggets” of knowledge you added from the web, WhatsApp, or your phone. For example, save an interesting article you found online or a helpful tip from a 
conversation to revisit later.

***With the ‘MindLi - Add Spark’ extension you can add Sparks from URL, connect them on the spot to relevant Boxes, or let them wait for you at your Inbox.

Use AI to get key points, estimate truthfulness, discover hidden controversies, and more.

Stress less, think deeper – simplify your AI thinking with MindLi.
